howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: BuddyBill simplifies expense sharing in a few simple steps.

step1.title: Create a group
step1.description: Start by creating a group and invite your friends to join by email.
step1.tip: Tip: Give your group a descriptive name like 'Paris Trip 2025' to easily find it later.

step2.title: Add your expenses
step2.description: Record each expense with its amount, currency, and the participants involved.
step2.tip: Tip: Take a photo of your receipts to keep track of all your expenses.

step3.title: Track balances
step3.description: See in real-time who owes how much to whom in the group.
step3.tip: Tip: Use the 'Simplified Balances' view to minimize the number of transactions needed.

step4.title: Settle up
step4.description: Record repayments made to automatically update balances.
step4.tip: Tip: Use the 'Mark as settled' function to quickly clear small debts between friends.
